textPlain: NotÂ honky tonk, but when I discovered the collection of Japanese tributes to (once great) The Muffs [1]. That punk vibe: getting together to play raunchy music is something I sorely miss from my college-days. And the two tributes, while celebrating the music of a very American band, feel like the most Japanese thing ever.[1] https://youtu.be/5GiL7FJIHRQ?si=9Sm32c-TRrtLuil1&t=1139
